sentence.Network_en: My cuticles were split and ragged, and my nails unevenly bitten.
sentence.Network_cn: 我指甲根部的表皮龟裂粗糙，指甲被咬得参差不齐。

sentence.Network_en: In the last 30 years many cherished values have bitten the dust.
sentence.Network_cn: 在过去的30年中，许多珍贵的价值观已经消失殆尽。

sentence.Network_en: Her fingernails are bitten to the quick.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的手指甲都被咬秃了。

entry.def: Bitten is the past participle of bite.

auth_sentence.content: Haven't you been bitten by a bug before?
auth_sentence.res_content: Haven't you been bitten by a bug before?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Haven't you been bitten by a bug before?

means.word_mean: 突然有了兴趣；突然着了迷

sentences.en: My mum was never really interested in going abroad until she went to America last year. Now she’s been bitten by the travel bug and hates staying at home!
sentences.cn: 直到去年去美国之前我妈妈从来对出国没兴趣，可是现在对旅游简直着了迷，在家里呆不住了！

means.word_mean: 一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井绳；一次被咬，下次胆小

sentences.en: ‘Will she marry again, do you think?’ ‘I doubt it—once bitten, twice shy.’
sentences.cn: “你觉得她还会再结婚吗？”“恐怕不会了吧，一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井绳。”
